title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8196 - Assessment Of Oil And Gas Economic Units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8196 - Assessment Of Oil And Gas Economic Units

State Regulations
§ 8196.1 - Separate assessment and entry on the assessment roll; effect on exemptions
§ 8196.2 - Statements of income and expenses related to economic units
§ 8196.3 - Annual charge to oil and gas producers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8196

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 590, 592, 593, 594, 595, 596, 597; L. 1986, ch. 207

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
